apps.name: Nuvio
apps.subtitle: Streaming app for movies and TV shows
apps.localizedDescription: Nuvio is a comprehensive streaming application that provides access to a vast library of movies and TV shows. Latest beta includes trailer support in Hero Section, IMDb rating fixes, and various backend improvements.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Added **OTA (Over-The-Air) support** – this allows the app to receive UI and code changes without requiring manual updates each time.
  - Note: Major updates and fixes will still require a full app update or fresh install.
  - ⚠️ Some slowness and heating is expected during the first few minutes after OTA updates while changes are applied.
• Fixed an issue where trailers kept playing in the background when navigating to other screens.

• Focused primarily on fixing various visual glitches across the app.
• Video player optimizations for smoother playback.
• Optimized Hero Carousel performance.

• Added new Hero Section layout for mobile devices. Users can now choose between the old (legacy) layout and a new swipeable carousel-based layout.
• Expanded HomeScreen customization:
  - Option to enable/disable text under posters.
  - Option to adjust poster size and corner radius.
• Minor UI changes and code fixes.

• Added a Trailer API to display trailers in the Hero Section (limited content available).
• Fixed redundant IMDb rating issue.
• Fixed sign-in page opening issue.
• Many minor backend fixes and improvements.
Initial release of Nuvio streaming app
